participant_1.name: Samantha
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and determined, always seeking new experiences and ways to improve my life.
participant_1.background: i waitress during the day to supplement my income. i wear a motorbike helmet to protect my head. i have light skin with big brown eyes. my main transportation is my motorbike.

participant_2.name: George
participant_2.personality: Caring and reflective, with a strong sense of duty towards helping others and sharing knowledge.
participant_2.background: i was poor growing up. i am a retired gym teacher. i volunteer at a soup kitchen. i like watching war documentaries. cheeseburgers are my favorite food.

content.text: that is my dream   but not going to wait for retirement to do that
